verses.verse: But now thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H3290>you<s%>, O Jacob, and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H3478>you<s%>, O Israel, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H1350>not<s%>: for I have redeemed <S%H7121>you<s%>, I have called you by your <S%H8034>name<s%>; you are mine.

When you pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, I will be with <S%H5104>you<s%>; and through the rivers, they shall not <S%H7857>overflow<s%> <S%H3212>you<s%>: when you walk <S%H1119>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, you shall not be <S%H3554>burned<s%>; neither shall the <S%H3852>flame<s%> kindle upon <S%H1197>you<s%>.

For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, your <S%H3467>Savior<s%>: I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your <S%H3724>ransom<s%>, <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and Seba for <S%H5434>you<s%>.

Since you were <S%H3365>precious<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, you have been <S%H3513>honorable<s%>, and I have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>: therefore will I give <S%H120>men<s%> for <S%H3816>you<s%>, and people for your <S%H5315>life<s%>.
<S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H935>not<s%>: for I am with you: I will bring your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H4628>west<s%>;

I will <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%>, Give <S%H5414>up<s%>; and to the <S%H8486>south<s%>, Keep not <S%H3607>back<s%>: <S%H935>bring<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, and my <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

Even every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>: for I have <S%H1254>created<s%> him for my <S%H3519>glory<s%>, I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H6213>him<s%>; Yes, I have made him.
Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> that have <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Let all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and let the <S%H3816>people<s%> be <S%H622>assembled<s%>: who among them can <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H8085>this<s%>, and show us former <S%H7223>things<s%>? let them bring <S%H5414>forth<s%> their <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, that they may be <S%H6663>justified<s%>: or let them <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, It is <S%H571>truth<s%>.

You are my <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>: that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H995>me<s%>, and understand that I am <S%H6440>he<s%>: before me there was no <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%>, neither shall there be after <S%H310>me<s%>.
<S%H3068>I<s%>, even I, am the Lord; and <S%H1107>beside<s%> me there is no <S%H3467>savior<s%>.

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%>, and have <S%H3467>saved<s%>, and I have <S%H8085>shown<s%>, when there was no <S%H2114>strange<s%> god among <S%H5707>you<s%>: therefore you are my witnesses, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that I am <S%H410>God<s%>.
<S%H3117>Yes<s%>, before the day was I am <S%H5337>he<s%>; and there is none that can deliver out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>: I will <S%H6466>work<s%>, and who shall let <S%H7725>it<s%>?

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, your <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; For your sake I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and have brought <S%H3381>down<s%> all their <S%H1281>nobles<s%>, and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, whose <S%H7440>cry<s%> is in the <S%H591>ships<s%>.
I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, your Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>, the <S%H1254>creator<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, your <S%H4428>King<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which <S%H5414>makes<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and a <S%H5410>path<s%> in the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>;

Which brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horse<s%>, the <S%H2428>army<s%> and the <S%H5808>power<s%>; they shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, they shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%>: they are <S%H1846>extinct<s%>, they are <S%H3518>quenched<s%> as a <S%H6594>wick<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> you not the former <S%H7223>things<s%>, neither <S%H995>consider<s%> the things of <S%H6931>old<s%>.

<S%H6213>Behold<s%>, I will do a new <S%H2319>thing<s%>; now it shall spring <S%H6779>forth<s%>; shall you not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7760>it<s%>? I will even make a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5104>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert<s%>.

The <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H8577>me<s%>, the dragons and the <S%H1323>owls<s%>: because I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5104>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert<s%>, to give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%>, my <S%H972>chosen<s%>.
<S%H2098>This<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have I <S%H3335>formed<s%> for <S%H5608>myself<s%>; they shall show forth my <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
But you have not <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H3290>me<s%>, O Jacob; but you have been <S%H3021>weary<s%> of <S%H3478>me<s%>, O Israel.

You have not <S%H935>brought<s%> me the small <S%H7716>sheep<s%> of your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>; neither have you <S%H3513>honored<s%> me with your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>. I have not caused you to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with a <S%H4503>offering<s%>, nor <S%H3021>wearied<s%> you with <S%H3828>incense<s%>.

You have <S%H7069>bought<s%> me no sweet <S%H7070>cane<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%>, neither have you <S%H7301>filled<s%> me with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>: but you have made me to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with your <S%H2403>sins<s%>, you have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> me with your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
<S%H4229>I<s%>, even I, am he that blots out your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> for my own <S%H2142>sake<s%>, and will not remember your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
Put me in <S%H2142>memory<s%>: let us <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H6663>you<s%>, that you may be justified.
Your <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and your <S%H3887>teachers<s%> have transgressed against <S%H6586>me<s%>.

Therefore I have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to the <S%H2764>curse<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1421>reproaches<s%>.
